channel.title: Is there a shoutbox in this forum
channel.description: im just wonderful if there a shoutbox cuz i didnt see it

item.title: Is there a shoutbox in this forum
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled

@Uncalled wrote:

Exactly, if you want a chatbox, go to other [more faggy and less developed] websites.

item.title: Is there a shoutbox in this forum
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“tL, post:2, topic:426614”]I don’t think we should have a chatbox because:

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=529270.msg3867855#msg3867855 date=1325128891]
We don’t need a chatbox, nor do we need the IRC mimicking a chatbox, if you want to chat:

just click the ‘IRC Chat’ button in the menu bar.

[/quote][/quote]I think we do not need a chat box when we have IRC

Read full topic

just click the ‘IRC Chat’ button in the menu bar.

item.title: Is there a shoutbox in this forum
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:11, topic:426577”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=529270.msg3862257#msg3862257 date=1324746960]
If MITB wasn’t a lazy bum he could probably integrate an IRC client into the top of the forums, mimicking a shoutbox. Of course i’d want it disabled, but having it as an option would please the turdbags. As long as it doesn’t join #mopar it would be fine.
[/quote]why fix something that works[/quote]

Read full topic
